pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.2_1: hatthaggahaṇampi sādiyanti, saṅghāṭikaṇṇaggahaṇampi sādiyanti, santiṭṭhantipi, sallapantipi,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.2_2: saṅketampi gacchanti, purisassapi abbhāgamanaṁ sādiyanti, channampi anupavisanti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.2_3: kāyampi tadatthāya upasaṁharanti etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.3: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇampi
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.4_2: saṅketampi gacchissanti, purisassapi abbhāgamanaṁ sādiyissanti, channampi anupavisissanti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.4_3: kāyampi tadatthāya upasaṁharissanti etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāyā”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.5_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.5_1: hatthaggahaṇampi sādiyanti, saṅghāṭikaṇṇaggahaṇampi sādiyanti, santiṭṭhantipi, sallapantipi,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.5_2: saṅketampi gacchanti, purisassapi abbhāgamanaṁ sādiyanti, channampi anupavisanti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.5_3: kāyampi tadatthāya upasaṁharanti etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāyā”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.8_0: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.8_2: sallapissantipi, saṅketampi gacchissanti, purisassapi abbhāgamanaṁ sādiyissanti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.8_3: channampi anupavisissanti, kāyampi tadatthāya upasaṁharissanti etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.11.1_0: “Yā pana bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇaṁ vā sādiyeyya,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.11.1_1: saṅghāṭikaṇṇaggahaṇaṁ vā sādiyeyya, santiṭṭheyya vā, sallapeyya vā, saṅketaṁ vā gaccheyya,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.11.1_2: purisassa vā abbhāgamanaṁ sādiyeyya, channaṁ vā anupaviseyya, kāyaṁ vā tadatthāya
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:1.11.1_3: upasaṁhareyya etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya, ayampi pārājikā hoti asaṁvāsā aṭṭhavatthukā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.10: manussapuriso, na yakkho na peto na tiracchānagato viññū paṭibalo kāyasaṁsaggaṁ samāpajjituṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.12: hattho nāma kapparaṁ upādāya yāva agganakhā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.13: Etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya ubbhakkhakaṁ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṁ gahaṇaṁ sādiyati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.15: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya nivatthaṁ vā pārutaṁ vā gahaṇaṁ sādiyati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.17: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya purisassa hatthapāse tiṭṭhati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.19: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya purisassa hatthapāse ṭhitā sallapati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.21: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya purisena— “itthannāmaṁ okāsaṁ āgacchā”ti—vuttā gacchati. Pade pade āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.24: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya purisassa abbhāgamanaṁ sādiyati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.27: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya yena kenaci paṭicchannaṁ okāsaṁ paviṭṭhamatte āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.29: etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya purisassa hatthapāse ṭhitā kāyaṁ upasaṁharati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.33: seyyathāpi nāma tālo matthakacchinno abhabbo puna viruḷhiyā evameva bhikkhunī aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūrentī assamaṇī hoti asakyadhītā. Tena vuccati pārājikā hotīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.35: saṁvāso nāma ekakammaṁ ekuddeso samasikkhatā. Eso saṁvāso nāma.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.1.36: So tāya saddhiṁ natthi. Tena vuccati asaṁvāsāti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.2.11: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj8:2.2.12: Yesaṁ bhikkhunī aññataraṁ vā aññataraṁ vā āpajjitvā na labhati bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvāsaṁ, yathā pure tathā pacchā, pārājikā hoti asaṁvāsā.
